TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Dispatcher extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于管理线程工作项队列的服务。

span.span: Provides services for managing the queue of work items for a thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 维护特定线程的工作项按优先级排列的队列。The maintains a prioritized queue of work items for a specific thread. 当创建在一个线程，它将变为唯一，可能与线程，即使关闭的情况下。When a is created on a thread, it becomes the only that can be associated with the thread, even if the is shut down. 如果你尝试获取当前线程和所关联的线程，将创建。If you attempt to get the for the current thread and a is not associated with the thread, a will be created. A创建时还创建。A is also created when you create a . 如果你创建后台线程，请务必在退出线程之前关闭调度程序。If you create a on a background thread, be sure to shut down the dispatcher before exiting the thread. 如果关闭的情况下，它无法重新启动。If a is shut down, it cannot be restarted. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]、只能由访问与之关联。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], a can only be accessed by the it is associated with. 例如，后台线程不能更新的内容关联上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程。For example, a background thread cannot update the contents of a that is associated with the on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 为了使后台线程访问属性，后台线程必须将工作委托给与关联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程。In order for the background thread to access the property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 这通过使用实现或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步和是异步的。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 该操作将添加到的队列位于指定。The operation is added to the queue of the at the specified . 如果上调用，已关闭，返回的 status 属性设置为。If is called on a that has shut down, the status property of the returned is set to . 上的方法的所有，除，为自由线程对象。All of the methods on , with the exception of , are free-threaded. 从派生的对象具有线程关联。Objects that derive from have thread affinity. 从派生的对象是自由线程时它们已冻结。Objects that derive from are free-threaded when they are frozen. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何放置操作。The following example shows how to place an operation onto a . 此示例的完整源代码，请参阅[单线程应用程序与长时间运行计算示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038)。For the full source code of this example, see [Single-Threaded Application with Long-Running Calculation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038). 首先，创建委托时，不接受任何参数。First, a delegate is created that accepts no arguments. [!code-csharp[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberInit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#threadingprimenumberinit)] [!code-vb[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberInit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#threadingprimenumberinit)] 接下来，调用。Next, is called. 此调用采用两个参数： 的优先级设置为，和回调，在传递委托的一个实例`NextPrimeDelegate`。This call to takes two parameters: the priority, which is set to , and the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `NextPrimeDelegate`. [!code-csharp[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberBeginInvoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#threadingprimenumberbegininvoke)] [!code-vb[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberBeginInvoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#threadingprimenumberbegininvoke)]

summary.span: 在与 关联的线程上异步执行委托。

span.span: Executes a delegate asynchronously on the thread the is associated with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，仅在创建线程才能访问该对象。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a may access that object. 例如，从主 UI 线程运行的后台线程不能更新的内容UI 线程上创建。For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a that was created on the UI thread. 为了使后台线程访问的内容属性，后台线程必须将工作委托给与 UI 线程关联。In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the UI thread. 这通过使用实现或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步和是异步的。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 该操作将添加到事件队列的位于指定。The operation is added to the event queue of the at the specified . 是异步的;因此，控制权会立即返回到调用的对象后调用。 is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called. 返回可以用于委托时在事件队列的委托交互的对象。 returns a object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue. 返回对象可通过多种方式与指定的委托，如交互：The object returned by can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as: - 更改的委托因为它正在等待执行的事件队列。Changing the of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue. - 从事件队列中删除委托。Removing the delegate from the event queue. - 等待要返回的委托。Waiting for the delegate to return. - 获取在委托返回其后的值执行。Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed. 如果选择多个调用在同一个，它们将在调用所做的顺序执行。If multiple calls are made at the same , they will be executed in the order the calls were made. 如果上调用，已关闭，返回的 status 属性设置为。If is called on a that has shut down, the status property of the returned is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `arg`参数可以为`null`如果不需要参数。The `arg` parameter can be `null` if no arguments are needed. 返回可以用于委托时在事件队列的委托交互的对象。 returns a object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue. 返回对象可通过多种方式与指定的委托，如交互：The object returned by can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as: - 更改的委托因为它正在等待执行的事件队列。Changing the of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue. - 从事件队列中删除委托。Removing the delegate from the event queue. - 等待要返回的委托。Waiting for the delegate to return. - 获取在委托返回其后的值执行。Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed. 是异步的;因此，控制权会立即返回到调用的对象后调用。 is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，仅在创建线程才能访问该对象。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a may access that object. 例如，从主 UI 线程运行的后台线程不能更新的内容UI 线程上创建。For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a that was created on the UI thread. 为了使后台线程访问的内容属性，后台线程必须将工作委托给与 UI 线程关联。In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the UI thread. 这通过使用实现或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步和是异步的。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 该操作将添加到事件队列的位于指定。The operation is added to the event queue of the at the specified . 如果选择多个调用在同一个，它们将在调用所做的顺序执行。If multiple calls are made at the same , they will be executed in the order the calls were made. 如果上调用，已关闭，返回的 status 属性设置为。If is called on a that has shut down, the status property of the returned is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 禁用调度程序处理属于高级的方法，旨在消除不相关的重新进入的可能性。Disabling dispatcher processing is an advanced method that is intended to eliminate the chance of unrelated reentrancy. 禁用处理的作用如下所示：The effects of disabling processing are as follows: - CLR 锁不将内部发送消息。CLR locks will not pump messages internally. - 不允许对象推送。 objects are not allowed to be pushed. - 不允许消息处理。Message processing is not permitted. 结构的返回被调用时可用来重新启用处理的调度程序。The structure that returns when it is called can be used to re-enable dispatcher processing. 调用上结构将重新启用处理。Calling on the structure re-enables processing. 只能在线程上调用与相关联。 can only be called on the thread the is associated with. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何禁用调度程序处理并重新启用处理的调度程序。The following example shows how to disable dispatcher processing and re-enable dispatcher processing. 在中调用**使用**语句。 is called in a **using** statement. 返回用作对象，以被释放的结构**使用**块结束。 returns a structure that is used as the object to be disposed when the **using** block finishes. 当上调用结构，处理的调度程序重新启用。When is called on the structure, dispatcher processing is re-enabled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，仅在创建线程才能访问该对象。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a may access that object. 例如，从主 UI 线程运行的后台线程不能更新的内容UI 线程上创建。For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a that was created on the UI thread. 为了使后台线程访问的内容属性，后台线程必须将工作委托给与 UI 线程关联。In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the UI thread. 这通过使用实现或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步和是异步的。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 该操作将添加到事件队列的位于指定。The operation is added to the event queue of the at the specified . 是同步操作;因此，控件将不返回到之前调用的对象后在回调返回。 is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.

summary.span: 同步启动 的关闭过程。

span.span: Initiates the shutdown process of the synchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需求不受限制的 UI 权限。 demands unrestricted UI Permissions. 当开始关闭的情况下，引发事件和设置为`true`。When the starts to shut down, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 不会关闭完全展开事件队列之前。The does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds. 调度程序完成的情况下，关闭时引发事件和属性设置为`true`。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 关闭流程开始之后，所有挂起的工作将中止队列中的项。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A表示处理挂起的工作项的循环。A represents a loop that processes pending work items. 调度程序处理在循环中的工作项队列。The Dispatcher processes the work item queue in a loop. 循环称为框架。The loop is referred to as a frame. 初始循环通常通过调用来启动应用程序。The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling . 进入该参数表示循环`frame`。 enters a loop represented by the parameter `frame`. 每次迭代循环，将检查属性类以确定是否应继续循环或如果它应停止。At each iteration of the loop, the will check the property on the class to determine whether the loop should continue or if it should stop. 允许属性显式设置，并且它遵循属性。 allows for the property to be set explicitly and it respects the property on the . 这意味着当开始关闭的情况下，使用默认的帧实现将退出，从而使所有嵌套的帧退出。This means when the starts to shut down, frames that use the default implementation will exit, which enables all nested frames to exit. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用达到类似结果作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]方法。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. summary.span: 在通过 或 执行委托的过程中，如果引发线程异常且未能捕获该异常，则发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过委托执行期间引发的异常时，将引发此事件或未捕获。This event is raised when an exception that was thrown during execution of a delegate by way of or is uncaught. 处理程序可以将该异常标记为已处理，这会阻止内部的异常处理程序调用。A handler can mark the exception as handled, which will prevent the internal exception handler from being called. 必须小心来避免创建辅助异常并发现出现任何的写入此事件的事件处理程序。Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur. 建议避免分配内存或执行处理程序中的密集型操作的任何资源。It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler. 事件提供了一种方法不会引发事件。The event provides a means to not raise the event. 首先，将引发事件; 如果上设置为`false`、不会引发事件。The event is raised first, and If on the is set to `false`, the event will not be raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将通过委托执行期间引发的异常的筛选器阶段引发此事件或且未能捕获。This event is raised during the filter stage for an exception that is raised during execution of a delegate by way of or and is uncaught. 调用堆栈不展开这一时刻 （首次异常）。The call stack is not unwound at this point (first-chance exception). 必须小心来避免创建辅助异常并发现出现任何的写入此事件的事件处理程序。Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur. 建议避免分配内存或执行处理程序中的密集型操作的任何资源。It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler. 事件提供了一种方法不会引发事件。The event provides a means to not raise the event. 首先，将引发事件; 如果上设置为`false`、不会引发事件。The event is raised first, and If on the is set to `false`, the event will not be raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有线程创建在可以访问。Only the thread the is created on may access the . 此方法是公共的;因此，可以检查任何线程以查看它是否有权访问。This method is public; therefore, any thread can check to see whether it has access to the . 之间的差异和是返回一个布尔值，如果调用线程不具有访问和引发异常。The difference between and is returns a Boolean if the calling thread does not have access to the and throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例使用以确定线程是否有权访问该线程，上创建。The following example uses to determine whether a thread has access to the thread that a was created on. 该方法采用一个对象作为参数，它被强制转换为。The method takes an object as an argument, which is cast to a . 方法的调用以验证是否可以访问该线程。The method on the of the is called to verify access to the thread. 如果调用线程可以访问、只需访问的成员更新。If the calling thread has access to the , the is updated by just accessing the members of the . 如果调用线程不具有访问权限，引发。If the calling thread does not have access, an is thrown. 此示例中捕获异常并将推送委托，它接受作为自变量，到的。This example catches the exception and pushes a delegate, which accepts a as an argument, onto the of the . 这将执行更新的工作。This will do the work of updating the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使你能够暂时释放到当前的调度程序的执行控件，以便它可以执行其他工作，就像处理其他事件的方法。This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events. 使用`await`，或`Await`在 Visual Basic 中，运算符的返回值来将控制返回到当前的调度程序。Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher. 使用此方法，如果想要让你的应用程序有机会处理事件，而你应用程序执行大量的 UI 线程上的工作。Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread. 例如，你可以在更新控件的运行时间较长循环中使用此方法。For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control. 此方法等效于调用方法并传入。This method is equivalent to calling the method and passing in .

Public Shared Function Yield (priority As DispatcherPriority) As DispatcherPriorityAwaitable
public: static System::Windows::Threading::DispatcherPriorityAwaitable Yield(System::Windows::Threading::DispatcherPriority priority);

param.name: priority
param.span: 安排延续的优先级别。

span.span: The priority at which to schedule the continuation.

summary.span: 创建异步产生控制权交还给当前计划程序并为该计划程序提供机会处理其他事件的可等待对象。

span.span: Creates an awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.

summary.span: 当控件返回等待此方法的结果的代码按指定的优先级计划时，发生的操作。

span.span: The work that occurs when control returns to the code awaiting the result of this method is scheduled with the specified priority.

returns.span: 异步产生控制权交还给当前计划程序并为该计划程序提供机会处理其他事件的可等待对象。

span.span: An awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使你能够暂时释放到当前的调度程序的执行控件，以便它可以执行其他工作，就像处理其他事件的方法。This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events. 使用`await`，或`Await`在 Visual Basic 中，运算符的返回值来将控制返回到当前的调度程序。Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher. 使用此方法，如果想要让你的应用程序有机会处理事件，而你应用程序执行大量的 UI 线程上的工作。Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread. 例如，你可以在更新控件的运行时间较长循环中使用此方法。For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control.
